name: eurovision-song-contest
title: Eurovision Song Contest
description: Discover information about the world's largest live music event
author: jacpd

commands.name: explore-contests
commands.title: Explore Contests
commands.subtitle: Eurovision
commands.description: Discover more aboutthe contests over the years

commands.name: explore-entries
commands.title: Explore Entries
commands.subtitle: Eurovision
commands.description: Discover the  entries from each contest year

commands.name: wins-leaderboard
commands.title: Wins Leaderboard
commands.subtitle: Eurovision
commands.description: Discover all winning countries and their wins by country

commands.name: explore-countries
commands.title: Explore Countries
commands.subtitle: Eurovision
commands.description: Discover past and participating countries and their Eurovision entries

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
